attributes.additional_details: The reason I want the government to do this is because the byd bd11 is really a terrible terrible bus design like its just so bad and I'm not the only one who thinks it's bad. They are so many groups and tiktoks of people hating on the byd bd11 and they want it banned or scraped. So please government look into this situation and talk to tfl so they can reconsider.
attributes.background: I want the government to talk to tfl board team and ask them to reconsider putting the byd bd11 on the routes SL1,34 and 141 and possibly scrap all the byd bd11s that are already in service on some routes like the 101 etc.

rejection.details:
Decisions about buses are a matter for TFL. You may wish to get in touch with your Greater London Authority (GLA) representative, you can find out who this is and their contact details below: 

https://www.london.gov.uk/who-we-are/what-london-assembly-does/london-assembly-members
